results.definition: a person who has received a degree from a school (high school or college or university)
make fine adjustments or divide into marked intervals for optimal measuring
of or relating to studies beyond a bachelor's degree
a measuring instrument for measuring fluid volume; a glass container (cup or cylinder or flask) whose sides are marked with or divided into amounts

examples: This school graduates 2,000 students each year

results.definition: receive an academic degree upon completion of one's studies
